text: Rick Flag is the name of three fictional characters appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The name is used by a father, son, and grandson also known as Rick Flag. The father, Richard Flag, was in the original Suicide Squad, a World War II unit. His son, Captain Rick Flag Jr., was a member of the Forgotten Heroes and led two different versions of the Suicide Squad. == In other media == Joel Kinnaman plays Flag in the live- action DC Extended Universe movies Suicide Squad and the sequel. ==References== Category:DC Comics characters
